translation: The body, the doer, the various senses, the different functions of various kinds, and the presiding deityâ€”the fifth.
commentary: 18.14 Adhisthana the seat or body? And also? doer the doer? Karanam the senses? f and? different of different? Various: various? f and? separately different? Action: functions? Daivam the presiding deity? f and? Eve even? Here here? Panchamam the fifth.Commentary Now listen to the characteristics of these five? of which the body is the first. It is termed the support or the seat. Is the body the seat of desire?
